Control Name: 5.5.4 CDN (content delivery network) is used to separate the hosting platform and end-users/clients.
Control Statement: Azure CDN can be used to separate the hosting platform from end users. Azure CDN contains a rule engine to remove platform-specific information and headers. The use of Azure CDN or 3rd party CDN will have different cost implications depending on what is chosen for the workload.
